citations.narrative:
The facility has not conducted their yearly heartworm testing on any of the dogs as specified in the program of veterinary
care. Failure to provide sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests in the dogs can lead to a delay in detection
and treatment. Correct by ensuring that sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas, worms,
coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) are conducted in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian is
documented and followed.
Correct by 01/17/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has not conducted their yearly heartworm testing on any of the dogs as specified in the program of veterinary 
care. Failure to provide sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests in the dogs can lead to a delay in detection 
and treatment. Correct by ensuring that sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas, worms, 
coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) are conducted in accordance with a schedule approved  by the attending veterinarian  is 
documented and followed. 
Correct by 01/17/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
